details.purpose: To record actions regarding imaging investigations.
details.misuse: Not used for recording the findings of the investigation; use openEHR-EHR-OBSERVATION.imaging for the findings.

items.items: An action related to an investigation by an imaging technique.
Imaging investigation scheduled for specific date and time.
Appointment for imaging investigation has been altered.
The imaging investigation has been completed; awaiting report.
The imaging investigation has been reported.
The imaging investigation is completed and report processed.
The imaging investigation has been reported and communicated to the referer.
The investigator has established that further imaging is required.
The imaging was not able to be completed.
The imaging investigation was not and will not be completed.
